name: Bouncy Ball Free
description:
Best killing time game!!
This free game is similar to the BUMPY(old game).
You must control the Bouncy Ball and eat the star.
You will feel Thrill and puzzle!
Are you Bounce! Bounce! Ready?
Just Enjoy!!

[ game control ]
Left area touch : Move to the left
Right area touch : Move to the right

[ features ]
1.Just free killing game
2.Easy control game
3.More than 160 stages
4.Many various item
5.So addictive
